publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7540 Pauline McNeill: Mother India, Glasgow’s Best Restaurant—That the Parliament congratulates Mother India on being named Glasgow’s Best Restaurant at the Glasgow Restaurant Awards; considers that this is a result of commitment of both the owner and staff to providing a quality dining experience; acknowledges the diversity of restaurants across the city, and hopes that there will be a Michelin star on the way to Glasgow in the near future. Supported by: Ms Wendy Alexander*
